extendedInfo.description: "Just Shake - and there it is" -CBS Newshttp://dft.ba/-shaketoshufflenewsShake to Shuffle Beta for All Android Music PlayersA shake to shuffle application that works with your preferred android music player.Current functions:Shake will skip to next songOption to make shakes pause the songSensitivity of shake is changeableRuns on start up if it was running when the phone was turned offToggle for notification iconFuture Plans:-Haptic Feedback-Homescreen Widget-Hardware buttons skipping songs-Redesigning settings UIThe app does not currently work with some newer phones. We are working on a fix.

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Desire HD on shake will only redial the last person from call list. Will do nothing with music
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: on Nexus 4
reviews.comment: Google just updated the music  app and now this app is broken. App worked great for a long time before this. Hope it gets fixed soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What I was looking for... kinda
reviews.comment: I wanted an app that would work even when the screen was off so I didn\'t have to constantly take my phone out to turn on the screen. Other than that it\'s great... especially for driving!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow no special permissions
reviews.comment: Awesome, first time I\'ve seen an application that requires no special permissions and does what it says.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good enough
reviews.comment: I was looking for an application that pauses and starts a song when the phone is shaked. Seem that it only pauses the music. It does not start it in any music player. Anyway this is still the best out there. Just fix it please and i would even buy it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: Not functioning on Droid Bionic. Launches voice command window when shaken.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer working
reviews.comment: Did used to work properly but now all it does is Pause and it  didn\'t even unpause.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its fucking awsome and handy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it. :)
reviews.comment: Does what it says, i just wish it had an option to work even when the phone is locked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy tab 2
reviews.comment: One of my best apps from my android collection. I really need this.
reviews.author: ayush gupta

reviews.title: Confused
reviews.comment: Works only to pause music not shuffle even if I set it to shuffle.. .fix that and its five star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need to play song option too !!! :-) :-) its getting pause but not getting play again !!!

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Perfect. Just what I was looking for. Thank you developers :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Although it could be disabled in a pocket (when proximity sensor is covered)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened?!
reviews.comment: This was great. But now it doesn\'t work with Power Amp fully. It only pauses. Uninstalled!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: brilliant if you just want to shake to shuffle
reviews.comment: does exactly as it says no complications

reviews.comment: But sometimes it change music by itself

reviews.title: Excellent !
reviews.comment: A Very Good App ! If you want to shuffle the song, change the music player setting first and shake it. Nice Job !
